description: Dashboard for DB Clusters managed with Percona Kubernetes Operators

panels.description: Shows the list of backups for the cluster and their statuses

defaults.noValue: No backups created for this database

panels.title: Backup Status

panels.description:
Number of vCPU cores used by a container. 
CPU Limit is shown only if it is set in the Custom Resource (recommended).
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description:
Number of bytes used by a container. 
Memory Limit is shown only if it is set in the Custom Resource (recommended).
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Persistent Volume Claim storage usage in bytes
panels.title: Storage Usage

panels.description: Percentage of how much of a storage capacity is utilized

targets.expr:
100 * (sum(kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{k8s_cluster_id="${k8s_cluster}",namespace=~"${namespace}"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim) and on (persistentvolumeclaim) kube_persistentvolumeclaim_labels{label_app_kubernetes_io_managed_by="${k8s_db_type}",label_app_kubernetes_io_instance="${k8s_db_cr}"})
/ (sum(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{k8s_cluster_id="${k8s_cluster}",namespace=~"${namespace}"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim) and on (persistentvolumeclaim) kube_persistentvolumeclaim_labels{label_app_kubernetes_io_managed_by="${k8s_db_type}",label_app_kubernetes_io_instance="${k8s_db_cr}"})

panels.title: Storage Utilization

panels.description: Status of Pods - shows if they were restarted and when
panels.title: Database Pods Status

panels.description:
Number of vCPU cores used by a container. 
CPU Limit is shown only if it is set in the Custom Resource (recommended).
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description:
Number of bytes used by a container. 
Memory Limit is shown only if it is set in the Custom Resource (recommended).
panels.title: Memory Usage

defaults.noValue: No containers were terminated for this database

title: Databases on Kubernetes - Summary
